comment.author: 70145948@N08
comment._content: incroyable ce documentaire :BRAVO de mettre en ligne ces images !
comment.authorname: Ma " FRANCE " souvent en écran noir !

comment.author: 48207431@N00
comment._content: Hard not to feel great compassion for this poor woman, interesting to see her ears pierced, and the clothing and hairstyles worn at this time.

comment.author: 25287387@N05
comment._content: Someone in North Shields Constabulary took pride in his (almost certainly *his*) calligraphy. Apart from maybe a one-line note of her hatch, match and despatch in parish records, this photo, recording this desolate moment in her life seems a pretty bleak memorial, in common with the others in this gallery.
